body:
I am proud to present my new Pvp montage on Avicus Nebula. I am almost prestige :) Please remember to leave a like or subscribe!

Video: http://youtu.be/H5M6ffm27dw
body_tagged:

title: Pvp Montages Episode 18

replies.body:
Hm ... I think it was ok.

I got a question, have you seriously made 18 threads so far? If so, sorry but I just have to quote Snow.

"I suggest you make one thread and put all your youtube videos on that one thread instead of making a new topic every time. This way, the forums will be less congested and people will be able to find your videos easier."

Otherwise, as I said, your montage was alright. I think you can do better.
